about_the_game:
※Inspired by a stage that appears in a certain work, we started the production of [Ghost Infinite Labyrinth] with the desire to freely walk through a space like that stage, and to ask ourselves what kind of feeling we would have if we really wandered into such a space. I wanted to express what it would feel like to be truly lost in such a space. The map that appears in [Ghost Infinite Labyrinth] was designed and constructed by the author of [Ghost Infinite Labyrinth] so that it could be used as a walking simulator, while keeping in mind what we wanted to express above. The characters from a certain work do not appear in the game at all. Please refer to the official X page of the creator of [Ghost Infinite Labyrinth] for the story of how [Ghost Infinite Labyrinth] was released.

Ghost Infinite Labyrinth

You have wandered into a Japanese labyrinth where ghosts lurk. Escape from this strange space while running from the ghosts.

"Ghost Infinite Labyrinth” is a horror walking simulator in which you escape from a large labyrinth while running away from ghosts.

It is recommended for those who want to challenge a high difficulty labyrinth, but it is also designed to challenge various players by implementing helpful functions (such as an invincibility mode in which you will not be damaged by ghosts).

Five articles to escape from the Ghost Infinite Labyrinth

1. Collect all three scattered soul fragments.

2. To find soul fragments , shoot the chakra. The chakras fly toward the soul fragments.

3. After collecting the three soul fragments, head to the "Gate of the Outer World", which exists in the upper level of the Ghost Infinite Labyrinth.

4. If you are attacked by a ghost, run away without hesitation.

5. When you are about to run out of life, find some udon noodles and eat them.

The important thing is to have a heart that will never break.

▼Play time

If you use help function: 40 minutes to 1.5 hours

If you do not use the help function: About 2 to 6 hours

▼ Video distribution and SNS posting guidelines

・Distribution is available to both individuals and corporations without permission.

・Monetization is only possible when using the functions provided by the video distribution site.

・We would appreciate it if you include the name of the game in the title of your video or live broadcast, or include a link to the Steam page in the summary section.

We will not be liable for any damages caused by the distribution of videos of this game.

▼Prohibited Items

・Any expression that is intended to or may be perceived as an attack on or slander of an individual or a specific group or company.

・Political, religious, or specific creed propaganda.

・Any expression that is offensive to public order and morals.

・Postings that infringe on the intellectual property rights, honor, trust, privacy, or any other rights of the Company or any third party, including proprietary rights and copyrights

・Expressions that may be misinterpreted as the Company's official transmissions

・Modification of this work or introduction of mods

・Other unexpected and incidental activities that may be deemed inappropriate.

The contents of these guidelines are subject to change without notice.
